name: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Jerome J. VERLIN, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Verlin
docket_number: No. 886, Disciplinary Docket No. 2—Supreme Court. No. 86 DB 92 Disciplinary Board

judges: CASTILLE, J., did not participate in this matter.
parties: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Jerome J. VERLIN, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 30th day of November, 1995, upon consideration of the Report and Recommendations of the Disciplinary Board dated October 30,1995, it is hereby
ORDERED that JEROME J. VERLIN be and he is DISBARRED, retroactive to September 4, 1992, from the Bar of this Commonwealth and he shall comply with all the provisions of Rule 217, Pa.R.D.E.
It is further ORDERED that respondent shall pay costs to the Disciplinary Board pursuant to Rule 208(g), Pa.R.D.E.
CASTILLE, J., did not participate in this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
669 A.2d 881
OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Jerome J. VERLIN, Respondent.
No. 886, Disciplinary Docket No. 2—Supreme Court. No. 86 DB 92 Disciplinary Board.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 30, 1995.
